title: To Catch A Cheater PT 2: This Mom Thinks Her Son Is Cheating On His Wife (Who Just Had His Baby!)
description:
You think your significant other is cheating, but you’re not certain. We’ll put them to the test! We’re ready to set the trap and go on Instagram (well, we’d send Kristin’s friend on Instagram) to try to lure him into doing something inappropriate so we could expose him as the dirty cheater he is (or, to be fair, expose him as the great guy and partner that he is).
Today's "To Catch A Cheater" has a twist - this time, it's not a wife that wants to catch her husband cheating...instead, it's a MOM who thinks her SON is cheating on his wife (the wife that he just had a baby with!)
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
